mapper.select:
select m.id as moduleId, m.block_id as blockId, m.name as moduleName, c.id as classId, c.name as className, c.module_id, b.id as blockId, b.enterprise_id as enterprise_id, b.name as blockName, b.status as blockStatus, b.detail as blockDetail from block b left join block_module m on b.id=m.block_id left join block_class c on m.id=c.module_id where m.delete_flg=0
and b.enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId}
mapper.insert: insert into block(`name`, `enterprise_id`, `create_time`, `update_time`, `operator_id`, `detail`, `plateform_flg`) values(#{name}, #{enterpriseId}, now(), now(), #{operatorId}, #{detail}, #{plateformFlg})
mapper.select: select * from block where delete_flg=0 order by id desc
mapper.update: update block set delete_flg=1 where id=#{id}
